::Magmatron::

    "I will join you in the base," He said. "But I do have m=
y own, let me tell someone what I need them to do."
    He turned away and =
contacted one of the Destrons that had sent him a message of and alliance. =
(Chimera) "Could you please return to the Destron Base and prep the CR Cham=
bers for transport, you will find worker drones to help."
    Then he conta=
cted some other Destrons signals. (Four Nightmares) "Please return to the D=
estron Base, I have information there for you."
    The Nightmares did. The=
y were wondering who it was that was speaking to them.
    "Now, Kit Kat, s=
hall we go to your new base?" He asked transforming to Drake mode.
(Kinger,=
 you get control of the worker drones to move the CR Chambers, but that's i=
t.)
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: logomorph@... 
  To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, November 14, 2000 9:15 AM
  Subject: Kit=
Kat


  ::KitKat::

  She looked up at Magmatron. "You can join us at our n=
ew base if ou 
  wish."

  She looked up and waited for Destructor to join =
her and the others 
  outside the old base before it blew up. 


        eG=
roups Sponsor
